text:
in http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/doc/mailer-doc/mailer-1.1/index.html ,
under "Configuration"
<taglib>
  <taglib-uri>http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/mailer-1.1</taglib-uri>
  <taglib-location>/WEB-INF/mailer.tld</taglib-location>
</taglib>

the third row should read 
  <taglib-location>/WEB-INF/taglibs-mailer.tld</taglib-location>
creator: olli@feedbackdialog.com
